sections.heading: Injuries; reports; time within which to file; terms, defined
sections.text: (1) In every case of reportable injury arising out of and in the course of employment, the employer or workers' compensation insurer shall file a report thereof with the Nebraska Workers' Compensation Court. Such report shall be filed with

sections.heading: establishes when the statute of limitations begins to run if an initial report required by this section is not filed, but section 48-144
sections.text: 04 does not provide for tolling of an already-running statute of limitations when and if subsequent reports are not filed. Dawes v. Wittrock Sandblasting & Paintin
